name: In re Benjamin Ronald CRAHALLA, District Justice in and for Magisterial District 38-1-20. Appeal of Judicial Conduct Board

parties: In re Benjamin Ronald CRAHALLA, District Justice in and for Magisterial District 38-1-20. Appeal of Judicial Conduct Board.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 12th day of December, 2000, the order of the Court of Judicial Discipline is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
792 A.2d 1244
In re Benjamin Ronald CRAHALLA, District Justice in and for Magisterial District 38-1-20. Appeal of Judicial Conduct Board.

Dec. 12, 2000.
